snippet.title: Galactic Invasion for the Bally Astrocade
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Galactic Invasion is a shoot 'em up in which the player is at the bottom of the screen, with an arrangement of aliens at the top. The player moves left and right to aim at an alien, then shoots a bullet up the screen, and the alien it hits is killed. At set intervals an enemy will move down the screen towards you, escorting a bomber, which is a moment of high danger. Clear a wave and another is generated.

Galactic Invasion was originally called Galaxian, but copyright issues forced the name to be changed. 


What I think.

Absolutely addictive game...and quite challenging too, if you don't pick "1" as difficulty.
